website_summaries.verdict: Cooks up food well, is inexpensive, and can last a lifetime if you are careful.
pros: It only holds 2 quarts, but that means it is perfect for smaller dishes
cons: Made of glass and that means it can be easily broken

customer_reviews.title: Very dangerous to put it mildly
customer_reviews.text: Not the first, second or third to explode! Why Amazon continues to sell this is amazing. They owe all of use more than the replace product, but also our dinner's which were wrecked....... Damage to oven with glass embedded in sides of oven. I would not even rate this as a 1. You have to give it that in order to comment. The explosion took place as I was reaching to take out of oven.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Freed Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Glass lid!  Make a million more of these.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. Why did they stop selling (in stores) Pyrex with GLASS lids? What were they thinking when someone in the room said, "you know what, let's get rid of the glass lid. Let's make a flimsy plastic lid that won't stay locked and can't be put into the oven. People will love it!" I've always wondered why CEO's never buy and use the products the company sells. If they did, and if they cared about more than their next bonus, they would sell things they way they were made in the 50's and 60s.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I use pyrex cookwear for baking. I really enjoy using pure glass in cooking. I preheated the casserole dish in the oven ,and then placed my marinated meet on to the hot glass to seer it as I have done in the past. BUT this time, instead of sizzling before going into the oven, it violently shattered apart all over the kitchen: glass all over the floor and all over the counters. I have no use for this kind of quality. It worked ok for general baking if temperatures rise and fall gradually, but it does not perform like my other pyrex. I question if it is really pyrex at all.
customer_reviews.author: G man

customer_reviews.title: Product didn’t last! It was defective, unreliable and unpredictable. Had to throw out the meal.
customer_reviews.text: After a few years of normal use this baking dish cracked straight down the middle during use in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: scbbt

customer_reviews.title: Has warning for cooking in the oven, just for reheat
customer_reviews.text: Despite warning not to use for cooking in the oven, I used to make perfect pork-shoulder roast (360F). Worked well, easy to clean. Simple, inexpensive, and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Arv

customer_reviews.title: Like the handles
customer_reviews.text: I've had lots of glass casserole pans, and have to say this one is easier to work with because of the handles and how the lid is shaped. I've been using it regularly to cook one pot meals - a piece of chicken or turkey and some veggies baked in my toaster oven. Works very well. I do add a little water to keep everything moist, which works really well. I'm thinking about buying another one if one of my other ones that I use breaks, as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: splashy

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and color
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and color; which seems to be a light blue versus clear. The packing was great. Have only used 2 times. Once in the oven at 350 degrees and in the microwave (half power to reheat oven prepared meal). I have always loved and trusted Pyrex. Hopefully this jewel won't let me down now. For years I also used Corning Ware but will not use any longer as most dishes lack handles and are not easily removed from oven or microwave when hot. This Easy Grab Casserole dish is just the right size and the handles and lid make it even more awesome.
customer_reviews.author: L square

customer_reviews.title: Worth having
customer_reviews.text: A very versatile cooking dish. It is perfect size for a couple and works in the oven and microwave and the handles make it easy to carry. Cleans up in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Pyrex! Great casserole dish & lid. Sturdy, easy to clean and easy to handle. It made some delicious potatoes au gratin!
customer_reviews.author: Bird Freak

customer_reviews.title: big, thick glass
customer_reviews.text: was a gift for my GF but she has been a little less than grateful so I kept it. this thing is a little heavy with the lid. has large handles and while I haven't baked with it. I did store my Chile in it and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: lucky

customer_reviews.title: You’ll order more
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to my cookware. Lid fits nicely and so far no problems. Nice looking serving dish also
customer_reviews.author: C. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy dishes, handles are great.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, deep casserole dishes. The side handles are great, but the trade-off is you lose the 'topping' space of the shallower pans that have a larger footprint. I didn't really think about it until I made macaroni and cheese in it - everyone always wants the crunchy topping, and there was considerably less of it available. Not a deal-breaker, but I wouldn't use it again to bake something that has a stellar topping. They are probably going to see more action as serving pieces that oven-to-table, to that reason. Typical Pyrex quality - hefty, well made, glass covers fit nicely, more pleasing to the eye than the regular flat casserole dishes. Overall, I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle in NH

customer_reviews.title: I really like this
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews, as always, before buying this. I'm a little wary about using it in the oven because of the pics of it exploding. HOWEVER, I can always use it for the microwave or storing leftovers. The lid is heavy which makes it seal well. It will still come in handy without using it to bake in so I'm giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ranae

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: don't buy unless they have reworked the dish. while it cooked quite well afterward is when the trouble begin. the lid does not fit well. it will come off much, much to easy. when i found this out it was to late to send back so i got rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Could easily have been better Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good 2 qt. dish
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I had been looking for-a 2 qt. baking dish w/handles. It is glass but not so heavy to be difficult to lift out of the oven when hot & full of food. There is a matching cover although it seems to not be a really tight fit, it is fine to keep food covered in the refrigerator if needed. Thus far the dish cooks all foods evenly and actually is fairly easy to clean when doing dishes by hand. It may be too long to fit well in the microwave but.. I got it for oven use. I have used it for baked goods as well as meat & pasta dishes w/the same good result.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Chase

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, I wish if it was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Good product to have if you want to avoid to use aluminum foil to cover your food when you cook. It has the lid and it has a grab handle on each side. I use it 4-5 times a week and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SHATTERS IN THE OVEN! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS DISH! I had it baking bread in the oven and it shattered, ruining 2 loaves of bread and creating a MESS in the oven!
customer_reviews.author: Bonita

customer_reviews.title: The perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is an ideal size for a one or two person househould. I make one dinner and have leftovers that store and reheat easily in this great casserole.
customer_reviews.author: Myra S. Rustin

customer_reviews.title: Glass Casserole
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice 2 Quart dish with a fitted lid. I like that it takes up less space than some of the other designs I have. The built-in handles make carrying a hot dish safer and easier. Although the quality appears to be very good, I am somewhat leery of most new glassware that is classified as Pyrex; I believe through the years something has been lost in translation, and I do not believe this type of dish would hold up to the same standards as the old, original Pyrex, but it is still a good piece.
customer_reviews.author: Otto Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I bought 2 and they arrived perfectly safe, all the way to Hawaii. These are the perfect size for holiday casseroles and I love that they come with a lid. Like always, they are strong and made to last, every time I buy Pyrex I'm reminded why they last for years and years. Around the same time I ordered a couple casserole dishes from Macy's and they both arrived broken, severely broken. I will stick with Pyrex for sure! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Tancredi

customer_reviews.title: Shattered
customer_reviews.text: If I could I would give it zero stars. It arrived completely shattered to pieces. I am sending it back ASAP. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sam E

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a 2 quart baking dish with a lid and handles. Hard to find. So glad I found it on Amazon, and it's Pyrex.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport, holds enough for two or three easily.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to fit 3 boneless skinless chicken breasts in this dish (two facing up, one facing down), which was really convenient. The large handles make removing from the oven and transporting a breeze. The lid (and it's handle) are great. It doesn't have a 100% tight seal or anything, but it gets the job done for casseroles and dump style meals (where you toss a bunch of random stuff in a dish and throw it into the oven).
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G

customer_reviews.title: Pyrex Easy Grab 2 Quart casserrole with glass cover.
customer_reviews.text: The secure easy grips are the high point of this product not to mention it is made in the USA. Once you use these well designed handles, you'll wish all your glass baking products had them. Will eventually transition to baking dishes with similar easy to grasp handles like this. The lid fits securely in place making it easy to store foods in the frig. Cooking in Pryex is always a breeze and enjoyable. This see-through baking dish is faultless with a price point that is hard to beat and just the right size. Yes, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Peter DP

customer_reviews.title: GREAT 2 QUART CASSEROLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this Pyrex casserole. The side grab handles make it much safer to handle, hot or cold, than previous generation Pyrex casseroles. I love the added feature of having a lid to keep a meal warm until serving time. Also, the dish can be used outside in the summertime and after serving, the lid would keep pesky flies away. Probably the best feature for me is that this dish fits into my counter-top toaster oven!! Couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: budgiebee

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It's clear so you can see how the cooking is going by just opening the oven. It's the perfect size for making a side dish for a family of 4. Cleans easily in dishwasher. Love it! Want a bigger one with a lid. So much easier when you don't have to use aluminum foil to cover a pan when baking. And with handle on the lid makes it easy to take off for last minute browning.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Maglara

customer_reviews.title: I just love this casserole
customer_reviews.text: I just love this casserole. I bought three of them and I am really making very good use of them. Beautiful in look and shape and of good quality. The price was also very great and so far the best price on the market. I do most of my shopping on line and I can confidently say it is the price on the market. Amazon this is a deal breaker and not even Walmart price is close. Highly recommended; you will never regret you did. Just follow the manufacturer's instruction and you will be good.
customer_reviews.author: Ene

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. useful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. useful. I put broccoli florets in it with some salad dressing, let it marinate, and then put it out - covered against flies and whatever - for people to sample. It is great for outdoor dinners too: The lid keeps the bugs off. I put chicken wings with garlic-and-Worcestershire-sauce in the oven in this, then add garlic-butter-rice to it as a serving dish, and into the refrigerator the leftovers go. I'm sure you have uses for this.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Sandstrom

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Perfect for casserole Recipes. Used in oven once already and came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Elle913

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Described and Desired
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and desired - a perfect casserole dish that let's you see exactly what's happening.
customer_reviews.author: AshevilleJim

customer_reviews.title: Needed this in my kitchen...
customer_reviews.text: This is so convenient and wish I had known of this style! Cleans easy & helps with steam. Also, easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne K. Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for medium size casseroles
customer_reviews.text: I love this casserole dish. It is the perfect size for the casseroles I make and is easy to clean and handle.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Just the perfect size for a couple or a single person
customer_reviews.text: Live my new glass Pyrex casserole dish. So easy to wash and store in a small kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia A Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Make a storage lid
customer_reviews.text: This size works great for our household, I have to use tin foil or saran wrap to store leftovers
customer_reviews.author: Revelyn

customer_reviews.title: Just right; great value.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent value, just the right size and perfect for the microwave. If you hate to microwave in plastic, this is the way to go. Having a fitted lid makes a huge difference in cooking time, food texture, and microwave interior cleanup. I have purchased several (one at a time) over several months and the quality has remained consistent with each purchase. Church Ladies, this is the covered dish for you: no need to risk your expensive casserole dishes, yet still allows for a beautiful presentation.
customer_reviews.author: riskTaker

customer_reviews.title: Okay gift I don't want it
customer_reviews.text: It's small but workable and I got it for someone else
customer_reviews.author: 1eagerbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Love them with the handles
customer_reviews.text: I had found these for my niece for a wedding shower gift. I had not updated my own casserole dishes since my own wedding 25 years ago, so treated myself to a couple of these. Love them with the handles, as my old ones were just round with lids and scary to remove from the oven. These are so nice!
customer_reviews.author: Bro

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Recommend it! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! Non-stick and easy cleanup. I love the handles on the lid makes holding it or picking up the lid very easy. I’m glad I got this item and I highly recommend it!! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive glass baking dish with lid. If you like cooking in glass containers, and appreciate when items are half-priced, this is a great addition to your kitchen, or as a hostess gift, etc. Also, the fast, free ( bought a couple of these plus a Christmas gift so met the minimum purchase requirement) and well-packaged shipping means I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gendot

customer_reviews.title: Nice Size for a Covered Baking Dish
customer_reviews.text: I use this dish to bake fish and chicken for my husband and I, and it would also be a great size for meatloaf or a small roast. The lid fits snugly, it cleans up easily, and I like using glass cookware because I know it's safe. There's no threat of leaching, as can be possible in other cookware. This is a good product, and I feel confident about giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Hug1

customer_reviews.title: Vary nice to have.
customer_reviews.text: Ships in few layers of bubble wrap. Arrived in one piece . And worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: cary

customer_reviews.title: super sized casserole
customer_reviews.text: This piece is a winner! The handles on the casserole help so much while putting in and taking out of the oven as well as serving. The lid fits securely and its handle is designed well for easy removal from casserole. It is the perfect size for casseroles, meats, vegetables, and more. One of its best features is that it is not too heavy! It is stylish enough to place on the table for serving. A keeper!
customer_reviews.author: TannK

customer_reviews.title: Great dish for great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great casserole dish. It has a nice design and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Einsmann

customer_reviews.title: Good quality good grice
customer_reviews.text: The quality I expect from Pyrex and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Blondredneck

customer_reviews.title: Pyrex Dish
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with product. It is easy to clean. I highly recommend Pyrex dish.
customer_reviews.author: FKL

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite pans
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful (I love the glass cover) I baked a pot roast with veggies... put the leftover in the refrigerator and reheated it again all in the same casserole. I then made tiramisu and put it in the refrigerator. The glass lid kept out the other refrigerator smells and the last piece was as tasty as the first.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Pyrex is always good. Yeah
customer_reviews.text: So you want to make a small casserole? This is it. Pyrex is always good. Yeah, I suppose you could drop it and break it as with any glass. That's up to you. Under normal circumstances, I wouldn't recommend less. The lid fits right, and an overall fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Darren W. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Get this dish!
customer_reviews.text: If you had one piece in your cooking collection, this should be it! I have made everything in this! I've bought it for a friend, my mother and my aunt. I can't recommend it enough. I've cooked chicken, beef and fish dishes in it, all with 100% success. Amazing! How's that for a review?! :)
customer_reviews.author: P. Clausen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice dish. I love the easy grab handles. I don't end up sticking my thumbs into my casserole. Just be sure to look for the "add-on" product. After I paid nearly $13, I found an add-on for less that $8 and ordered two more.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this s a replacement which was chipped. Have used it several times and is prefect for our cooking needs. Love the handles and lid.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Van Someren

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best ever casseroles
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best ever casseroles. It's light weight, durable .. I've inadvertantly tested that ... and easy to clean. While it is not round in shape, I still use it in the microwave. I turn the microwave turntable up-side-down, place this on top, and simply turn it around half way through the cook cycle. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Everyone to have one of these in their kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Has nice large handles and a nice top cleans up well this is an excellent price
customer_reviews.author: e-man

customer_reviews.title: Very nice dish
customer_reviews.text: I do a chicken every week in a roasting pan and then transfer it to this after removing some of the bones. It's a perfect size for that. Eventually I make chicken pot pie with the scraps. It's great for that, scalloped potatoes, anything. And the lid is really nice. Makes it so easy for storing leftovers.
customer_reviews.author: Helen E. Dicks

customer_reviews.title: Who likes to cook?
customer_reviews.text: I do sometimes. I like it when there are things that make it easier for me. This is a pretty great baking dish. Surprisingly fits quite a bit of food and the lid makes it easy to store leftovers. I love the handles on the side for smooth macguyvering in and out of the oven. This was a great purchase for me...and can be for you!
customer_reviews.author: trayler

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: This product costed me because when visitors saw it they wanted one for themselves as gifts. It is a very nice dish. It's perfect for creating delicious meals for the family and it comes with a very convenient glass cover.
customer_reviews.author: Denessa Bardell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this small casserole dish. The square shape is kinda cool and I love the handles on the lid that make it easy to pick up. Its a perfect size for two people, great for chicken breasts. I even bake artichokes in it (wrapped in foil). I wish it came in colors, but I'm very happy with the clear glass anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Stockbridge

customer_reviews.title: For generations now we have trusted Pyrex and we won't stop now....
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as thick of Pyrex glass as previous generations of this casserole, but still good quality. A great size for Mac & Cheese, Tuna Casserole, and other casseroles and after all that is exactly what it is for. With all the cooking vessels we have in our kitchen, this one is one of the most welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun GourmetTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great Size and Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Pyrex glass casserole dish!!! It looks good and is a very good size.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great sized covered baking dish!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my little side oven perfectly! Made piggies in it.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: beautiful dish. but lid tends to slide off too ...
customer_reviews.text: beautiful dish. but lid tends to slide off too easily. nearly break it a few times. one must be careful of handling it. a skill o balance is required. i would recommend to get one with plastic lid. but of course the glass looks much nicer.
customer_reviews.author: LoC

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and packaged very well
customer_reviews.text: The quality is wonderful and I love the fact that it comes with a lid.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two!
customer_reviews.text: This casserole is perfect for making meals for just my husband and I. The handles are very helpful and the lid is very well made and easy to grab. I use it almost daily, its really a great size for side dishes for larger families or main courses for a couple. I will definitely be ordering another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Smith

customer_reviews.title: It’s wow
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I’ve ever bought in amazon omg I love it
customer_reviews.author: Farah L.

customer_reviews.title: Pyrex Easy Grab
customer_reviews.text: We have used this item as of this date. However, we do not expect any problems with it. It is a replacement for a broken one.
customer_reviews.author: James Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grab when hot!
customer_reviews.text: This dish is great for cooking and food storage. Baked on foods are easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Staten

customer_reviews.title: Pyrex knows cooking
customer_reviews.text: Loved the glass lid! Cook and serve. Easy to grasp
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Practical
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with or without a pot holder. Cleans up well. My daughter uses these and I just really liked the way they look and perform
customer_reviews.author: barbara L. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Definately worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Product was as advertised, very happy with it, the handles make it easy to remove from oven.
customer_reviews.author: depboy

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Love baking in glass, and lives up to it's name.
customer_reviews.author: William Webb

customer_reviews.title: Practical everyday dish by a well established brand.
customer_reviews.text: Liked that it has a lid. Bought it for corn on the cob and to keep my tomatoes in and keep the fruit flies out!
customer_reviews.author: heddahopper43

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient for baking casseroles
customer_reviews.text: Easy and convenient for baking casseroles. The lid is very agronomic and easy to open and close. The handles are so useful. I really love it. I wish it was larger, but it is a decent size, can fit about 6 cups of ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: "Easy Grab" is a well-earned title!
customer_reviews.text: I love this casserole dish. "Easy Grab" is definitely a title this dish earns. The handles are well made, easy to hold, even in oven mitts. A great dish and cover.
customer_reviews.author: Leila Lodencraft

customer_reviews.title: Casserole w/cover
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice. allows me to marinate my wild game over nite in fridge then to the oven so I dont have the mess of more than one container, It has the space also, nice size. I gave it 4 stars because it dont have the holder/ place mat, Other than that, glad I purchased it. tony w
customer_reviews.author: antny159

customer_reviews.title: The product I can used at the oven or freezer or for salad .
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic I used for all my meal . I love the price versus practice . I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TONELLY

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: shape of dish is a little unusual...not really a loaf pan but works well for casseroles and meat loafs (doesn't really need to be made in loaf shaped pan!) Have mixed feeling about the handles...they're more "solid" than usual on casserole dishes-so it's easier to hold, but they make it take up more room in the cabinet (or wherever it's stored). Would (still) reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with this Pyrex 2 QT. casserole. It's dishwasher safe, oven safe, freezer safe and microwave safe. I bought this for my son to used, He live by himself and it's perfect to cook small ham, chicken and fish. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nwklee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality,nice shape
customer_reviews.text: I like the shape as opposed to round dish.I would like the top to fit upside down in dish to store better, but would recommend
customer_reviews.author: SHARON G KROUGH

customer_reviews.title: Great for any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love this dish because it is easy to clean and do not have to use foil to cover the dish
customer_reviews.author: B Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love the shape!
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this casserole, and the rectangle shape. It's just right if you're having a few people over; not too big, not too small. And if there are leftovers, once it's cooled, you can just put it in the fridge with the lid on.
customer_reviews.author: Nexta

customer_reviews.title: thought I was ordering a smaller unit, but like this one also...
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was purchasing a smaller item, but can still use this for baking family food. I really like the large handles.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Wright

customer_reviews.title: Like it very much and the price was right!
customer_reviews.text: I broke three casserole dishes between Thanksgiving and Christmas (go figure). I like the clear glass far better than the white Corning Ware. I tend to burn casseroles on the bottom, so the clear glass will help to prevent that.
customer_reviews.author: NanaColleen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Unique!
customer_reviews.text: Great casserole. Elegant looking. And easy as any other to use or clean. Without lid, good for salad or dessert. Must get at least one more.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Broemser

customer_reviews.title: Great Dish!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect as I live along and only cook for one. Love the size.
customer_reviews.author: happyretired

customer_reviews.title: Pryex Easy Grab
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great item.This was bought for a friend for a gift.She was very happy, it was just what was needed and they were pleased.
customer_reviews.author: cak

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could get lids for all my Pyrex pans. Many of the meat dishes I cook I roast in the oven which I lightly brown first then cover with aluminum foil to tenderize. The lid makes this a no brainer, I wish I could find a larger version.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Morton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for salad, jello, or a small casserole. I love the handles because it makes it easier to transport. I really recommend this for a couple or single person. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I orderd this so I wouldn't have to use aluminum foil to cover my baking dishes. The price was great and it arrived quickly. It holds 4 average size chicken breasts perfectly. I would totally buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: AuntieB

customer_reviews.title: Casserole
customer_reviews.text: I use this often to make casseroles. I really like the the shape and it makes a good size casserole. I put the lid on when I put it in the refrigerator. It a bit larger, which is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookware Addition
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Pyrex? This 2 quart casserole dish is perfect. I love that it comes with the glass top. It cooks evenly and its easy to clean, i.e. dishwasher safe. Another great Amazon purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Raye

customer_reviews.title: Pyrex Easy Grab covered casserole
customer_reviews.text: Very solid glass covered casserole dish but the handles were a bit larger than expected so doesn't fix in my RV convection oven but they make it easier to remove from the regular oven when filled
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for my needs. Purchased a 3 quart size ...
customer_reviews.text: Adequate for my needs. Purchased a 3 quart size, but the top was plastic. Hope it doesn't melt in the oven. May have been the victim of a error in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for fitting in the oven.  Great value
customer_reviews.text: Liked for baked veggie recipes. Went with whatever your other serving dishes are. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Evangeline Vollrath

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice baking dish. Perfect size for baking for one-two people.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Love pyrex
customer_reviews.text: We are big fans of pyrex brand so when we were looking for a casserole dish we went with one from them. Works great and love that it came with the lid for storage in case we dont eat everything we made.
customer_reviews.author: Anna L illig

customer_reviews.title: Great Casserole container!
customer_reviews.text: Love Pyrexware..have been using Pyrex for over 50 years that I've been married, and love this little casserole...also ordered the 1 & 2 Cup Pyrex measuring cups....can always use extra cups when baking!
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design & capacity
customer_reviews.text: An ancient pyrex baking dish slipped & shattered on my tile floors; this one replaced it. Excellent. The handles make for easy in/out of the oven and the baking capacity is perfect for a small gathering.
customer_reviews.author: mia coolpa

customer_reviews.title: The handles are well designed to hold onto, with ...
customer_reviews.text: The handles are well designed to hold onto, with either hot or cold serving. Deep for casseroles, I'm thinking lasagna for two.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Good size for my needs and I love the attached handles and the lid. Not the same pyrex as "back in the day" - seems a little less strong to me - but good nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful, easy to clean, sturdy casserole dish. It is hard to find a good one that isn't too heavy. And I don't like using aluminum because it isn't healthy when it is heated.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin McGinn

customer_reviews.title: Nicely crafted
customer_reviews.text: Great loaf dish.... From the oven, to the table then attractively covered to be refrigerated.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

product_meta.title: Pyrex Easy Grab Glass Casserole Dish with Glass Lid (2-Quart)
product_meta.description: This medium-size baking dish will be your go-to for everything from stuffing to shepherd's pie to pot roast. The glass lid keeps food moist in the oven and fresh in the fridge, and larger handles let you transport it into and out of the oven easily, even with oven mitts. Includes (1) 2-Quart Glass Casserole Dish with Glass Lid.
feature_bullets: Larger handles and a glass lid make this casserole a kitchen essential.
Includes (1) 2-Quart Glass Casserole Dish with Glass Lid
Durable high-quality tempered glass is dishwasher, freezer, microwave and preheated oven safe
Nonporous glass won’t absorb food odors, flavors, or stains

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
